text: Józef Grudzień (1 April 1939 – 17 June 2017) was a Polish boxer. Grudzień was born in Piasek Wielki, Poland. He won two medals at the Olympic Games: gold in the Lightweight division at Tokyo 1964 Olympic Games Boxing Results and silver at Mexico City 1968. He also twice won medals at the European Amateur Boxing Championships, silver at East Berlin 1965 and gold at Rome 1967. He was the winner of the Aleksander Reksza Boxing Award 1991. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish boxers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Poland Category:Olympic silver medalists for Poland
title: Józef Grudzień
